revised_title: Incompatible Poisson Structures in Hamiltonian Systems
tldr: The author discovers supplemental invariant Poisson structures that are incompatible with the original Poisson structure for an arbitrary completely integrable Hamiltonian system. The study provides a complete classification of these invariant Poisson structures and proves the instability of their compatibility property. This research contributes to the understanding of bi-Hamiltonian systems and the properties of compatible pairs of Poisson structures.
